name: Klouds
tagline: Web Front End for interacting with Cloud-based REST APIs
body:
# Klouds.io / Klouds.org ![Image of Klouds] (http://www.ozzadar.com/klouds.png) A web framework for dynamically launching and accessing web servers. Uses rest APIs to manage containers. Traefik to handle container routing for front facing web services.
[Traefik on Github](https://github.com/EmileVauge/traefik "Traefik on Github")
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
